label.description: Display label for this option (e.g., "Fight the dragon").

key.description: Keyboard shortcut to select this option (e.g., "a", "1").

target.description: The NodeId this option leads to.

description.description: Optional description providing more detail about this choice.

description:
A BranchOption is a single choice available at a BranchPoint.
It has a display label, an optional hotkey, and a target node.
